Sql.query: select barrcodi, barrnombre, barrtension, barrpuntosuministrorer, barrbarrabgr, barrestado, barrflagbarratransferencia, areacodi, barrflagdesbalance, barrbarratransferencia, barrusername, barrfecins, barrfecact, osinergcodi, barrbarratransf from PR_BARRA order by barrnombre
SELECT BARRCODI, OSINERGCODI FROM PR_BARRA WHERE OSINERGCODI = '{0}'

insert into pr_barra ( barrcodi, barrnombre, barrtension, barrpuntosuministrorer, barrbarrabgr, barrestado, barrflagbarratransferencia, areacodi, barrflagdesbalance, barrbarratransferencia, barrusername, barrfecins, barrfecact, osinergcodi, barrbarratransf, barrflagbarracompensa ) values ( :barrcodi, :barrnombre, :barrtension, :barrpuntosuministrorer, :barrbarrabgr, :barrestado, :barrflagbarratransferencia, :areacodi, :barrflagdesbalance, :barrbarratransferencia, :barrusername, :barrfecins, :barrfecact, :osinergcodi, :barrbarratransf, :barrflagbarracompensa )
